topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b32e3d6368721912be1700#post_54b32e3d6368721912be1700
Root beer ain't beer at all.
Fun fact: The inventor originally wanted it to be called Root _Tea_, but changed to _Beer_ upon friend's suggestion.
